title: We Aren’t in Kansas Any More: My Recon of the 2023 UCI Gravel World Championships Course
content:
Tarmac, doubletrack, steep climbs, and singletrack, all tucked into the folds of Veneto's Prosecco Hills, will make for a gravel race unlike any other.

Read the full article at We Aren’t in Kansas Any More: My Recon of the 2023 UCI Gravel World Championships Course on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
